name: places/ChIJ0SyzqbBYwokR8lamZUFleJg
formattedAddress: 500 E 85th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 500 E 85th St, New York, NY 10028-7409, USA

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Novick for fillers, especially if you want a riskier/technical area like the nose. I chose him based on his experience. I came in for a consultation/saline test and he took his time to address my concerns so I booked an appointment. Never felt pressured to do any procedures. His results are so elegant but natural! Both my bridge and tip are evened out. Even used two different types of filler to sculpt the best look. There is significant improvement from both the front and side profile and my facial features feel a lot more balanced. I don’t see or feel any side effects either, no pain/swelling after the procedure, he is really an expert!

originalText.text: Hands down the best of the best, I highly recommend Dr.Novick to all my loved ones and everyone! He truly is a very kind, intelligent, compassionate, and attentive doctor who is wholeheartedly devoted to his practice and cares for the well-being of all of his patients. He took all the time necessary to explain the procedure to me in full detail. Dr. Novick makes sure you feel comfortable throughout the entire process, from the consolation all the way until the end of the procedure. He is informative and straight forward with all his options and risks associated with any medical and or cosmetic questions and concerns. Super professional and clean practice, social distancing measures were all taken closely upon office arrival. I look forward to seeing him for all my future visits!

originalText.text:
I have been working with Dr. Novick for the last year and a half.  He is unfailingly kind and very honest about what will be done and how much each procedure will cost.  At some points, he has actually dissuaded me from scheduling another appointment too soon because he wanted to make sure that our visits would stay affordable for me.  I think that is very rare in a physician.

As far as medical knowledge goes he is extremely professional, and his treatments have really helped me without causing any sort of complications.  In short, he knows his stuff.  I am very pleased with our work together so far, and am looking forward to continuing it!

originalText.text: I had an amazing and positive experience with Dr. Novick. He sits down with you and sets the expectation straight. I didn't have to wait at all and I was taken care of very well. My case of acne scars isn't as bad as others, it's on the lighter side as Dr said. I had a few ice pick scars and maybe 4-5 rolling scars. Before we even performed anything, he asked if I was sure that the scars bother me, which I said they did. I really appreciated that he asked that question and took into consideration my income as a grad student, unlike many other dermatologists, where they try to shove you with as many procedures as possible. I got  TCA cross done and I'm hopeful for the results! He refused to treat the scars that weren't deep enough which I also really appreciate. I'm giving 4/5 stars only because of the price. It is on the expensive side but I understand that he has almost 50 years of experience and it's competitive with other practices in the area. However, it would have been nice if it was a little lower since I didn't have as many scars, but I can understand why that doesn't matter.

originalText.text: Dr. Nelson has been in the industry for many years and is very knowledgable about non invasive acne scar treatments. I have trusted him to perform subcisions on my face and I'm very happy with the results.
